name: Punched Cards Game
description:
Hello. This is my entry for the OLC Code Jam 2022. The theme did not inspired me, but I did something - a puzzle game for rainy days :) The game runs in the Windows Console and it has been developed in pure C++ without any dependencies. There is a process which creates a procedural background music and a custom Terminal ...

The gameplay is easy to understand - it works as a simple binary game choosing columns and/or rows in order to invert booleans. You have to fit with a randomized pattern. Seven levels ++
